WelcomeScreen.msg_welcome: Your gateway to the world of Bitcoin Cash (BCH)
WelcomeScreen.des: Bitcoin Cash (BCH) and Simple Token (SLP) wallet

AuthLoadingScreen.parseError1: Badger Wallet currently only supports sending one coin at a time.  The URI is requesting multiple coins.

HomeScreen.NoTokensFound: No SLP tokens in the vault yet

ReceiveScreen.Msg_Scan_public: Scan a public key below to receive funds. Tap on a QR code to copy the address.

RestoreWalletScreen.Msg_Enter_your_12_word: Enter your 12 word seed phrase or mnemonic to restore and access an existing wallet
RestoreWalletScreen.erorrMsg_Double_check: Double check the recovery phrase and try again.
RestoreWalletScreen.Msg_check_the_recovery: check the recovery phrase and try again
RestoreWalletScreen.erorrMsg_Seed_Phrase: Seed Phrase / Mnemonic cannot be empty

WalletDetailScreen.Msg_take_few_minutes: This may take a few minutes.

ContactUsScreen.Msg_we_hope: We hope you are enjoying Badger Wallet
ContactUsScreen.Msg_if_you_wish: If you wish to give feedback, ask a question, or contact us for another reason, get in touch with the team through electronic mail or Telegram

Bip70ConfirmScreen.This_payment_request: This payment request is invalid, expired or already paid, please check with the merchant and try again.

LogoutScreen.Msg_about_to_logout: You are about to logout of your wallet. You will need to use this wallets seed phrase to access the held funds again.
LogoutScreen.Msg_Make_sure: Make sure you have the seed phrase backed up in a secure location before logging out.
LogoutScreen.Msg_If_the_seed: If the seed phrase is lost, we are unable to recover the wallet for you.

ViewSeedScreen.Text_This_seed_phrase: This seed phrase is the key to the funds in this wallet.
ViewSeedScreen.Text_losing_this: Losing this phrase is losing access to this wallet. If lost we will be unable to help you recover your Seed Phrase or wallet.
ViewSeedScreen.Text_Write_the_12-word: Write the 12-word seed phrase down in order, keep it safe, and do not share it with anyone you do not trust with access to your wallet.
ViewSeedScreen.Text_I_am_in: I am in a private area and wish to see my seed phrase

SendSetupScreen.Msg_Error_Invalid_address: Invalid address, double check and try again.
SendSetupScreen.Msg_Error_Can_only_send_SLP_tokens: Can only send SLP tokens to Simpleledger addresses.  The to address should begin with 'simpleledger:'
SendSetupScreen.Msg_Error_Can_only_send_BCH: Can only send Bitcoin Cash (BCH) to cash addresses, the to address should begin with 'bitcoincash:'
SendSetupScreen.Msg_Error_Cannot_send_more_available: Cannot send more funds than are available
SendSetupScreen.Msg_Error_Badger_Wallet_currently_only_s: Badger Wallet currently only supports sending one coin or token at a time.  The URI is requesting multiple coins.
SendSetupScreen.Msg_Error_Sending_different_coin_or_toke: Sending different coin or token than selected, go to the target coin screen and try again

KeySweepScreen.Text_To_recover: To recover Bitcoin Cash (BCH) or SLP Tokens from a paper wallet, follow the steps below.
KeySweepScreen.Text_1_step: 1. Scan the private QR code on the paper wallet.
KeySweepScreen.Text_2_step: 2. Select a token if there are multiple.
KeySweepScreen.Text_5_step: 5. Repeat until all BCH and tokens have been swept.
KeySweepScreen.Multiple_SLP_tokens_detected: Multiple SLP tokens detected, select one to sweep first...
KeySweepScreen.Msg_No_balances_found: No balances found on this paper wallet
KeySweepScreen.Msg_If_the_funds_appear_on_a_block_explo: If the funds appear on a block explorer, wait a few minutes and try again.
KeySweepScreen.Msg_Sweep_again: Sweep again if this paper wallet had more than 1 type of SLP token.
KeySweepScreen.Msg_Error_Sweep_failed: Sweep failed, ensure your wallet or the paper wallet has BCH for the transaction fee

Frist_FAQ.title: What is Badger Wallet?
body: Badger Wallet is a Bitcoin Cash (BCH) and SLP token wallet, designed
to prioritize simplicity for everyday use.

Second_FAQ.title: Which cryptocurrencies does Badger wallet support?
body: Bitcoin Cash (BCH) and thousands of SLP tokens.

Third_FAQ.title: What is Bitcoin Cash (BCH)?
body: Bitcoin Cash (BCH) is a peer-to-peer electronic cash system for the
world. BCH enables permissionless spending for micro transactions,
everyday spending, large business deals, and everything in between.

Fourth_FAQ.title: What are Simple Ledger Protocol (SLP) tokens?
body: SLP is a token system built upon the Bitcoin Cash network. SLP
tokens allow anyone - or business - to create, send, and receive
their own tokens for whatever they want.
body_toice: SLP tokens enable hundreds of new use-cases on the BCH network. From
voting systems, reward / loyalty points, ticketing systems, event

Fifth_FAQ.title: Why can't I send tokens?
body: Receiving tokens is free, but sending tokens requires a bit of
Bitcoin Cash (BCH) to pay the transaction fee - typically
body_toice: Be sure to add a little bit of BCH to your wallet and try again.

Sixth_FAQ.title: How private is Badger?
body: Badger uses a single address for all transactions. This means
transactions to and from Badger can be linked together with analysis
body_toice: We will make updates focused on privacy in the future.
